entries.journal_entry_description: Purvis Arrison seems to think he's at war with the Tuskens. He's asked you to recon their junk town, just outside of Mos Eisley.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Purvis wants you to check out the village from another angle.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: You have a knack for recon. I can tell. That's good intel, soldier. I understand there's a few graveyards nearby. I'd like to know more about their terrain. Get back to work.
